column2: If  there  is  any  conflict  with  the  reasons  given  in  this  judgment  in  favour  of  the

column1: Appellants with the reasons given in the District Court  Judgment, the reasons given by this
Court must replace the conflicting reasons in the District Court Judgment.
Hence, Appeal is allowed with costs.

H
on. Jayantha Jayasuriya, PC, CJ.
